item.title: Criminals are primed to target holiday shoppers. Watch for these 5 scams.
item.description: Criminals are targeting shoppers with fake websites, bogus charities and other fraudulent pitches, according to insights from Visa.

item.title: Judge says Trump official's testimony on removing Abrego Garcia is "a zero"
item.description: The Trump administration is pushing to remove Kilmar Abrego Garcia from the U.S. ahead of his criminal trial on human smuggling charges next year.

item.title: 3 things borrowers should do with home equity rates under 8% now
item.description: Home equity loan and HELOC interest rates remained under 8% this week. Here's what homeowners should do in response.
